00032 // redirecting pages
00033 $msg = '<script type="text/javascript">';
00034 $msg .= 'alert(\''.__('You Have Been Logged Out From Library Automation System').'\');';
00035 $msg .= 'location.href = \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'index.php?p=login\';';
00036 $msg .= '</script>';
00037 // unset admin cookie flag
